entries.title: I was hit with $1,300 in credit card fraud. Here’s how to cut your risk.
entries.description: You can't completely prevent credit card fraud. But these six steps do reduce your risk.

entries.title: Musk says he met McCarthy and Jeffries to ensure Twitter is ‘fair’
entries.description: Elon Musk said he met with House Speaker Kevin McCarthy and House Minority Leader Hakeem Jeffries to discuss ensuring Twitter “is fair to both parties.”

entries.title: Big Tech was moving cautiously on AI. Then came ChatGPT.
entries.description: Google, Facebook and Microsoft have used AI in their products for years. But OpenAI's ChatGPT is stealing the limelight, forcing them to move faster.

entries.title: With Trump reinstatement, Meta finds new ways to punish world leaders
entries.description: The social media giant is expanding the range of interventions that it can use to fight dangerous rhetoric from Trump and other public figures.
